Get comprehensive InnoDB storage engine status using SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS.

**When to use:**
- Performance troubleshooting (deadlocks, lock waits, buffer pool issues)
- Transaction analysis and concurrency problems
- I/O and memory usage investigation
- DO NOT use for basic table or index structure analysis

Shows detailed information about InnoDB's current state including transactions, buffer pool, I/O statistics, and deadlock information. No parameters required.
